DOC.brief_title: Optimized Programming Spinal Cord Stimulation ( SCS ) System
DOC.detailed_description: The clinical result study may help validate prediction make mathematical model neuron activate SCS increase scientific knowledge way different program relate satisfactory outcome , use model may help development new product .
DOC.criteria: Be previously implant Precision SCS System ( 336 month post permanent implant ) 2 parallel percutaneous lead place T8T10 . Be implant Precision SCS System treatment neuropathic pain trunk and/or limbs Be 18 year age old Be extremely satisfy , satisfy , satisfy SCS therapy treatment pain condition Be able use pen tablet document region paresthesia pain Be able lie supine position 45 minute minimum Be able verbally report qualitative quantitative aspect paresthesia sensation . Have paresthesia threshold standard program 4mA supine position Have minimum upper contact one lead T8 low contact T11 vertebral level Be willing able comply studyrelated procedure Agree study requirement provide write Informed Consent Unable read , write , speak , understand English Currently pregnant plan become pregnant course study Have negative finding prescreening screening requirement Upon fluoroscopy , location lead identify outside T8T10 vertebral level Unable perceive sensation paresthesia associate stimulation trunk and/or low extremity Have drug pump and/or nonPrecision neurostimulation device ( regardless whether active inactive ) Have interventional pain procedure surgery ( include Interlaminar epidural steroid injection , Transforaminal epidural steroid injection , Caudal epidural steroid injection , Selective nerve root block , Intraarticular lumbar facet injection , Sacroiliac joint injection , Piriformis muscle injection , Trochanteric bursa injection , Hip/knee joint injection , Medial branch block ( innervates facet joint ) , Pulsed radiofrequency neurotomy medial branch , Pulsed radiofrequency dorsal root ganglion , Thermal ( high temperature ) radiofrequency neurotomy medial branch , Trigger point injection , Botulinum toxin injection ) involve spine within past 30 day Have condition likely confound evaluation study endpoint . Conditions may make paresthesia coverage variable course study include multiple sclerosis , partial spinal cord injury , diabetic peripheral neuropathy , peripheral vascular disease , scoliosis , deafferentation , etc .
